pid.pos 0.1.0

Package index

All functions

all_random_replacement.f()
Function factory for random replacement.
auto_replace()
Apply a replacement function to a `rules.frm`.
browse_model_location()
Browse user to folder for UDPipe models.
browse_udpipe_repo()
Open github link to the 'english-ewt-2.5' UD model.
data_frame_report()
Tags a data frame with part of speech tags.
data_frame_tagger()
Tags a data frame with part of speech tags.
find_files()
List all files in a directory with a given extension
hashing_replacement.f()
Function factory for hashing replacement.
load_replacement_rules()
Convert a set of `replacement_rules` (as defined with `report_to_replacement_rules`) to a function that can be used to modify a data frame.
longer_than()
Produces a function that checks if any strings in a vector is longer than 'limit'
random_replacement.f()
Function factory for random replacement.
read_data()
Reads a data file
report_on_folder()
Itterates over a folder of data files and produces a report on proper nouns.
report_to_replacement_rules()
Convert the output of `data_frame_report` to a csv file for editing. It is intended the user changes the `To` column to define desired replacements.
sentence_frm
A short data frame of free text including PID. Used for basic examples and tests.
the_one_in_massapequa
The One in Massapequa

Developed by Robert Cook.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
